property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.) ■ While summoning a Partner, you may tap this card in your mana zone as if it had all civilizations.

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown/Zenith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, return a total of 3 Dragons and/or colorless spells from your graveyard or mana zone into your hand. You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may tap this creature. ■ If your opponent's creatures attack, they attack this creature if able. ■ Each of your Dragons and Commands gets "Eternal Omega". (When a creature that has "Eternal Omega" would leave, it returns to your hand instead.)
